amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 116-6 to provide authority for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to consult with the Secretary of Defense in implementing the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slotkin amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Slotkin amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Slotkin.
